attributes.action: Reduce taxation on petrol and diesel by 50%. Then adjust spending elsewhere to pay for it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Perhaps by reducing the foreign aid budget.
Perhaps by stopping paying kids for staying in school.
Perhaps by only paying incapacity benefit to truly disabled people who deserve it.
Perhaps by reducing the police budget for UPMARKET cars such as Range Rovers and BMWs when equally capable and cheaper cars would suffice.
Perhaps by selling off the Bank that we now own in the form of Northern Rock.
Perhaps by reducing the size of the civil service which has grown in size like never before under any other government, creating quangos and think tanks. You do the thinking thats what your paid for.
Perhaps by making prisons cheaper to run by reducing the perks such as tv, games, gyms.

However you do it Mr Brown, it needs to be done.
